description: '''Moses Anthony Davis''' [[Order of Distinction|OD]] (born 22 August 1973), professionally known as '''Beenie Man''', is a Jamaican [[dancehall]] [[Toasting (Jamaican music)|deejay]]. His awards include DJ of the Year Award eight years in a row. His twelfth studio album ''[[Art and Life]]'' received a [[Grammy Award]] in 2001.
